title: Fuzzy Search - Lazy Edit Distance in Haskell
description: I recently stumbled upon the edit distance problem again while working on an ElasticSearch problem at work. It gave me fond memories of the wonder and joy of studying algorithms. However well-trodden a path, another clever "trick" lies waiting to be found. Using the power of lazy evaluation to solve the edit distance problem is a beautiful rendition of an old favourite, yet current problem.

title: Operation Coldstore and its Long Shadow
description: Long before I had heard about Operation Coldstore, I felt its reverberations in waking moments as a child in school and at home, where there was an acknowledged hush among adults that lived through those critical years. It was and sadly still is in our milieu that we mandate a silence to criticism about the government even if actions or policies in the past or present have been disagreeable.
